response_fields.name: p_paid_to_credit_car
response_fields.description: Whether the order is paid to credit card

response_fields.name: sales_number
response_fields.description: The number provided to sales to bill store items room to the guest.

response_fields.name: shipping_fee
response_fields.description: The shipping fee paid by folio

response_fields.name: shipping_number
response_fields.description: The number provided to trigger to affect the charged room to be paid by folio

response_fields.name: created_order_number
response_fields.description: This is an element of ref used by Store at checkout to affect store items orders in Internal Store System

response_fields.name: taxes_and_packaging
response_fields.description: The tax charged in the folio for packaging

response_fields.name: bank_in_store_tables
response_fields.description: The final amount of all orders between members of the Internet, contributed by all reservation Guests, Store, Spa and Health of Purchase

response_fields.name: bank_routing_fee
response_fields.description: A fee charged to the bank for the stored routing and merchandise returned to the Internet, City to City local order

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking
